title: Chocolate domino slices
ingredients: ['For the cake', '175g softened margarine', '175g caster sugar', '175g self-raising flour', '25g sifted cocoa powder', '3 medium eggs', 'Chocolate buttercream', '175g butter', '275g icing sugar', '25g cocoa powder', 'Decoration', 'multi-coloured sweets such as Smarties']
